name: MEOutgoingMessageEncodingStatus
desc: An object that contains information about security measures the user can apply when composing a message.

items.name: init(canSign: Bool, canEncrypt: Bool, securityError: Error?, addressesFailingEncryption: [MEEmailAddress])
items.desc: Creates an object that describes whether the message security handler can encrypt or sign an outgoing message.

items.name: var canSign: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the message security handler can digitally sign the outgoing message.

items.name: var canEncrypt: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the message security handler can encrypt the outgoing message.

items.name: var securityError: Error?
items.desc: An error that the message encoder encountered while determining the encoding status for the outgoing message.

items.name: var addressesFailingEncryption: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses that prevent the message security handler from signing the message.
